ComicInfo.Summary:
It's a warm family welcome when She-Hulk assures her cousin Bruce that she is happy as the Green Giantess. Later, the Avengers Mansion is attacked by the Leader!
After the Leader lets Hulk and his companions return to Earth, no longer fearing Hulk as a threat, the Leader starts plotting ways to take over the world. Bruce meets Iron Man and helps him locate Omnivac. Bruce also apologizes to She-Hulk for turning her into a monster. She-Hulk tells him that she doesn't see herself or Hulk as monsters. Soon after, Arsenal the Living Weapon emerges and attacks She-Hulk. Will Iron Man be able to find Omnivac? Will Hulk and She-Hulk be able to hand the Living Weapon?
